subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oakland’s Dallas Braden pitched a perfect game last weekend, as surprising an achievement as is the story of his rise from Stockton, Calif., to the 24th round of the 2004 draft to the majors.
snippet: Oakland’s Dallas Braden pitched a perfect game last weekend, as surprising an achievement as is the story of his rise from Stockton, Calif., to the 24th round of the 2004 draft to the majors.
